abstract: Gary Lehman is said to be "physically exhausted."
snippet: Gary Lehman is said to be "physically exhausted."
lead_paragraph: The illness that has forced has forced the tenor Gary Lehman to withdraw from the title role in the Metropolitan Opera's production of "Siegfried," the third installment in the company's new "Ring" cycle, is an energy-sapping virus, his manager said on Thursday.

headline.main: Manager Cites Virus as Reason for Star's Withdrawal from Met's 'Siegfried'
